name: Wordmaze
overview: While walking through the maze, you must answer the English vocabulary problem that appears at each intersection. A correct reply takes you closer to the exit. But you have to work fast; if you don't answer within a fixed time, the fuse on the bomb will run down and the bomb will explode. And watch out I If you stay in the maze too long, the oxygen supply will run out. WORDMAZE can be played at two levels: beginner and advanced The program in this cartridge contains a total of approxiimately 300 English words. If you want, you can also use the dictionary and enter new vocabulary. WORDMAZE: Will you make it out in time? Each English word you answer correctly helps you escape from the maze. Try and make it out while there's still oxygen to breathe!
